Ordena las paradas seleccionadas y elimi: Sort the selected stops and delete the ones you don't want to see anymore
Añade o elimina las paradas favoritas us: Add or remove favorite stops using the star
No tienes visores favoritos configurados: You don't have any favorite viewers configured
Para poder ver tus paradas favortias, de: To see your favorite stops, you must configure them
Para poder añadir paradas a favoritas se: To add stops to favorites, select a municipality
Esta APP ha sido desarrollada de manera: This APP has been developed personally and without profit
La información proporcionada sobre los t: The information provided on times and stops is obtained from the affected transport companies
Los objetivos de la APP son los siguient: The objectives of the APP are the following
Fomentar el uso del transporte público: Promote the use of public transport
Facilitar acceder a los visores ocultand: Facilitate access to viewers by hiding the configuration of favorite stops. This allows a person with little mobile skills to enjoy the APP when a friend or family member configures it for them
¿Por qué no puedo gestionar las paradas: Why can't I manage the stops in the viewer?
La configuración de los visores se \"ocu: The configuration of the viewers is 'hidden' in the menu to separate configuration from 'day a day'
De esta manera le podrás decir a tu fami: This way you can tell your family member or friend who is not very fond of mobile phones: no problem, I'll set up the app for you and you just have to start it
Si te gusta la app y quieres apoyar mi t: If you like the app and want to support my work, you can make a donation through PayPal
Indica si deseas ver o no el número de v: Indicate whether or not you want to see the number of wagons in the viewer results
El número de Metros que pueden ser carga: The number of Metros that can be loaded is high. You can establish what is the maximum time of Metros that will leave.
Indica si quieres ver la diferencia de t: Indicate if you want to see the time difference between the buses that Bizkaibus provides. This can give an orientation of when the next one may come since Bizkaibus only provides two buses per line.
no_info_bizkaibus: Bizkaibus is not providing information for the stop {{parada}} {{denominacion}}
Para poder ver tus visores favoritos, de: To see your favorite viewers, you must configure them on the configuration page
Indica qué atajos quieres mostrar en la: Indicate which shortcuts you want to show in the header. If you choose more than 2 it may not fit well on your device
A continuación se muestran las paradas c: The nearby stops are shown below
Por favor, ayuda a que Arin sea más cono: Please help Arin become more known. Would you like to leave a review?
Selecciona un origen y destino para defi: Select an origin and destination to define a trip. The viewer will show both the outbound and return trip.
Indica cómo quieres que se comporte el p: Indicate how you want the folding of viewers in Metro Bilbao to behave
Indicate how you want the folding of viewers in Euskotren to behave
La respuesta de la API no contiene infor: The API response does not contain information about train schedules. Please verify the API information.
Muestra la diferencia de tiempo entre lo: Shows the time difference between the next two buses.
guide_step1_content: From the main menu you can access all transport services. Each one has its own options to see viewers, manage your favorites and more.
guide_step2_content: For Bizkaibus, you can add stops by searching by town. Select a municipality and then mark your favorite stops with the star. You can also search for them by your location!
guide_step3_content: In Metro Bilbao, in addition to individual stops, you can configure complete trips (origin and destination). The application will show you the next trains for both directions.
guide_step4_content: On the Configuration page, you can choose which transport services you want to have as shortcuts in the bottom navigation bar for faster access.
metroBilbao.l3MixedLineError: Querying a trip that includes Line 3 with another line is not implemented at this moment. Stay tuned for future updates
